original_text: Each of them had four faces and four wings. They had something with the shape of human hands under their wings.
korean_text: 각기 네 얼굴과 네 날개가 있으며 날개 밑에는 사람의 손 형상이 있으니

sentences.original_text: Each of them had four faces
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 각자는 네 개의 얼굴을 가졌고

sentences.original_text: with the shape of human hands
